title: French macaroons, four ways
ingredients: ['Macaroons', '6 egg whites', '1 pinch salt', '400g icing sugar', '250g finely ground almonds', '1 to 2 drops food colouring (yellow, pink, brown and green)', 'Filling', '350g icing sugar', '240g softened butter', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons double cream', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon crushed pistachios', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon strawberry jam']
